alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 11 at 8:40PM CDT until September 11 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT/815 PM MDT/ FOR EAST CENTRAL LEA...NORTHWESTERN ANDREWS AND GAINES COUNTIES... At 840 PM CDT/740 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles east of Nadine, or 15 miles southwest of Seminole, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Seminole, Nadine, Gaines County Airport, Knowles, Frankel City, Paynes Corner, Higginbotham, and Gaines County Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
